text: @SecPompeo @DeptofDefense @realDonaldTrump The real problem dear is the Covid19 not Hong Kong and their business in the future with your country. The real problem is origin exactly of Wuhan s virus coronavirus Covid19. I don t care of Hong Kong. Your problem is also inside of your country USA. Forget Hong Kong. Regards

entity.name: Hong Kong declares coronavirus outbreak an 'emergency'
entity.description: The city’s leader, Carrie Lam, also extended school holidays until February 17, suspended official visits to mainland China and said this year’s Hong Kong Marathon would not take place.
